# Welcome to scExploreR! 

scExploreR allows for in-depth exploration of single-cell datasets without code. The app contains extensive visualization tools as well as plots 

## Plots Tab

To view visualizations, go to the "plots tab". The following visualizations are available:

- DimPlots
- Feature Plots
  - Feature co-expression plots, when two genes are entered
- Violin Plots
- Dot Plots
- Scatterplots
- Ridge Plots
- Cell Type Proportion Plots


For more information on plot types, go to the "?" button and select "Single-Cell Visualizations"
